src:
Tribunekaoset i Eliteserien: To supportere behandlet for brannskader
B√•de i Trondheim og Oslo m√•tte personer fra supportergruppene til Brann og Stab√¶k behandles for brannskader etter at de hadde v√¶rt i kontakt med bluss p√• tribunen.
04 Nov 2019, 17:46 by Sondre Moen Myhre
Det bekrefter NFF, Brann Bataljonen og Stab√¶k Support.
‚Äì Jeg kan bekrefte at det er rapportert til oss, sier konkurransedirekt√∏r i NFF Nils Fisketj√∏nn.
I kampene mellom V√•lerenga ‚Äì Brann og Ranheim ‚Äì Stab√¶k forekom bluss p√• bortetribunene som NFF ikke hadde gitt dispensasjon for.

Kaos p√• tribunen da Brann gikk p√• ny stjernesmell

Kj√∏rt til legevakt
I Trondheim ble den skadede personen f√∏rst kj√∏rt til legevakten. Han har ogs√• senere v√¶rt til sjekk p√• legevakten i B√¶rum etter hjemkomst.
‚Äì Det var ikke s√• alvorlig som f√∏rst antatt. Vi kj√∏rte ham likevel til legevakten for √• v√¶re sikker. Han var p√• sjekk i dag og legen ans√• det ikke som alvorlig, forteller styreleder i Stab√¶k Support, Bj√∏rnar Posse Sandboe.


P√• EXTRA arena fyrte bortesupporterne fra Stab√¶k opp bluss underveis i kampen.üì∑ Richard Sagen

Personen er medlem av Stab√¶ks offisielle supporterklubb, og skal ha blitt skadet da han fors√∏kte √• rydde bort blussene.
‚Äì Han brant seg p√• fingrene da han skulle hjelpe til √• rydde fra bakken, sier Sandboe.


‚Äì Gj√∏r episoden at dere vil revurdere bruk av bluss fremover?


‚Äì Jeg tror at han som brant seg alltid vil v√¶re p√•passelig. Han skulle hjelpe til, og dessverre ble det s√•nn. Det var ikke s√• ille som folk ga inntrykk for under kampen.

Etterspill etter fyrverkerikampen p√• Romerike: ‚Äì Liv og helse ble satt i fare

Bataljonen: ‚Äì Vi er opptatt av lovlig bluss
I Oslo var det ogs√• blussbr√•k s√∏ndag kveld da Brann-supporterne blant annet valgte √• kaste dem inn p√• banen.
Ogs√• her skal skaden ha oppst√•tt ved fors√∏k p√• opprydding av tribunene.
‚Äì Det var en i styret v√•rt som pr√∏vde √• rydde litt og ta bort noe greier, s√• fikk han litt p√• h√•nden. Vi ropte p√• R√∏de Kors for √• f√• sett p√• det for man vet jo aldri, sier styreleder i Brann Bataljonen Roger Lilleb√∏e Hansen.


Flere bluss ble kastet p√• banen under kampen mellom V√•lerenga og Brann. Det f√∏rte til at den ble midlertidig stoppet.üì∑ Berit Roald/NTB scanpix

Den skadede fikk is av R√∏de Kors og beskjed om √• holde omr√•det kaldt over natten.
Hansen er understreker at blussene p√• Intility Arena ikke var i regi av Branns offisielle supportergruppering.
‚Äì Vi er veldig opptatt av lovlig bluss. Det som skjedde s√∏ndag var ikke en offisiell greie fra Bataljonen, sier han.
text:
Tribune chaos in the Elite Series: Two supporters treated for burns
Both in Trondheim and Oslo, persons from the Brann and Stab√¶k supporter groups had to be treated for burn injuries after having been in contact with the fire in the stands.
04 Nov 2019, 17:46 by Sondre Moen Myhre
This confirms the NFF, Fire Battalion and Stab√¶k Support.
- I can confirm that it has been reported to us, says NFF's Director of Competition Nils Fisketj√∏nn.
In the battles between V√•lerenga - Brann and Ranheim - Stab√¶k there was a flare on the away stands for which the NFF had not given exemption.

Chaos in the stands when Fire went on new stellar smells

Drove to the emergency room
In Trondheim, the injured person was first driven to the emergency room. He also later went to check on the emergency room in B√¶rum after returning home.
- It wasn't as serious as first thought. We still drove him to the emergency room to be sure. He was on a check today and the doctor did not consider it serious, says Stab√¶k Support Chairman, Bj√∏rnar Posse Sandboe.


On the EXTRA arena, away supporters from Stab√¶k fired up flames during the match.üì∑ Richard Sagen

The person is a member of Stab√¶k's official supporter club, and must have been injured when he tried to clear the flares.
- He burned his fingers when he was supposed to help clear the ground, Sandboe says.


- Does the episode make you want to reassess the use of flares in the future?


- I think he who burned himself will always be careful. He was supposed to help, and unfortunately it was like that. It wasn't as bad as people gave the impression during the fight.

Aftermath of the firework match at Romerike: - Life and health were compromised

Battalion: - We are concerned about legal flare
In Oslo, there was also a fire on Sunday night when the Brann supporters, among other things, chose to throw them into the field.
Here, too, the damage must have occurred through attempts to clean up the stands.
- There was someone on our board who tried to clear a bit and remove something, so he got a little on hand. We called on the Red Cross to look at it because you never know, says fire chief of the Fire Battalion Roger Lilleb√∏e Hansen.


Several flames were thrown onto the pitch during the battle between V√•lerenga and Brann. This caused it to be paused.üì∑ Berit Roald / NTB scanpix

The injured person was given ice cream by the Red Cross and told to keep the area cold overnight.
Hansen emphasizes that the fires at Intility Arena were not organized by Brann's official supporter group.
- We are very concerned about legal flare. What happened Sunday was not an official thing from the Battalion, he says.
